card.name: Birthing Pod
card.text: ({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.){1}{G/P}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Bloodbraid Elf
card.text: HasteCascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

card.name: Chrome Mox
card.text: Imprint — When Chrome Mox enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonartifact, nonland card from your hand.{T}: Add one mana of any of the exiled card's colors.

card.name: Elspeth, Sun's Champion
card.text: +1: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.−3: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater.−7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have flying."

card.name: Necropotence
card.text: Skip your draw step.Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

card.name: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh
card.text: +2: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.+1: Each opponent exiles two cards from their hand.−4: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh deals 7 damage to target opponent, creature an opponent controls, or planeswalker an opponent controls.−12: Exile each nonland permanent your opponents control.

card.name: Shark Typhoon
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create an X/X blue Shark creature token with flying, where X is that spell's mana value.Cycling {X}{1}{U} ({X}{1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)When you cycle Shark Typhoon, create an X/X blue Shark creature token with flying.
